queries.query: select count(*) from medication m join patient p on m.patient_hid = p.patient_hid join encounter e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where m.drug_id=':pentaDrugid:' and ((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramStartDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramStartDate:')) <= 23) or (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramEndDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(p.dob), date(':paramEndDate:')) <= 23)) and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';

select count(*) as v1 from observation o join encounter e on o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where o.concept_id =  ':newBornCare:' and ((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramStartDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramStartDate:')) <= 23) or (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramEndDate:')) >= 12 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, date(o.datetime), date(':paramEndDate:')) <= 23)) and e.facility_id=':paramFacilityId:';
